name: Choices (s4b3r6)
description:
Take on the role of an adventurer in this massively twisting set of stories, where your every choice may impact your story in some way.

---

This is a fairly experimental game - the vast amount of choices and paths is probably going to overwhelm me at some point, so we'll see.

You can access the development version over here, which tends to be more "bleeding edge" than what I've uploaded to itch.
